metadata.title: CVE-2022-37331 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds write vulnerability exists in the Gaussian formatorientation functionality of Open Babel 3.1.1 and master commit 530dbfa3. Aspecially crafted malformed file can lead to arbitrary code execution. Anattacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: openbabel package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
